entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
